name: Perraw - FPS Clone War Alpha
description: Perraw is a FPS multiplayer/Tower Defense placed in an futuristic environment Developed in free time as a hobby. WARNING: THIS GAME IS EARLY ACCESS ALPHA.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP (Service Pack 3) Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: Game not tested for notebook chipset
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: Game not tested for notebook chipset
